content.body: Wonder what/where’s might be the best place to get in touch with jwatt these days. I mean, some chat/messaging way, without resorting to e-mail. I want to ask him about svgwg.org domain stuff

> <@annevk:matrix.org> Did you try @jwatt:mozilla.org?

Perfect! And nope I hadn’t tried it but have just now DM’ed him there. Thanks much
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @annevk:matrix.org
Did you try @jwatt:mozilla.org?
Perfect! And nope I hadn’t tried it but have just now DM’ed him there. Thanks much
